column22:
-Dwellings are allowed in the Downtown District as conditional use on all non-street-level floors.

-Dwellings are allowed in the Downtown District as conditional use at the street-level provided that no
more then 50% of the gross square footage can be used for residental purposes.

New construction and existing buildings to be substantially improved that are located in Zones A, Al-30, AE, and AH shall have the lowest floor, including basement, elevated to 1 foot
or more above the base flood elevation.
